product_name: Omega Pacific ISO Locking Standard D Screwgate Carabiner
long_description: This lightweight locking 'biner is constructed using an ISO Cold Forging process for an extraordinary strength-to-weight ratio. Locking mechanism provides security against accidental opening, and locks to the gate, not the frame, to prevent jamming. Classic D shape carriers the loads off-center, toward stronger, non-gated side. Hooded gates offer smooth rope-bearing surfaces. Tapered nose for increases strength and spin rivets for smooth snag-free gate surfaces. CE certified.
short_description: This lightweight locking 'biner is constructed using an ISO Cold Forging process for an extraordinary strength-to-weight ratio.
